title: Sevilla 1-4 Barcelona: 10-man visitors edge closer to LaLiga top two
description: Barcelona moved to within two points of LaLiga leaders Real Madrid following a hard-fought 4-1 victory away to struggling Sevilla on Sunday. Hansi Flick’s side spent the final half an hour at the Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan Stadium with a man less after Fermin Lopez was sent off for a poor challenge on Djibril Sow. title: Napoli 1-1 Udinese: Serie A leaders stumble in Scudetto quest
description: Napoli missed the chance to move six points clear at the Serie A summit after being held to a 1-1 draw at the Stadio Diego Armando Maradona by Udinese. Antonio Conte’s side have now played out back-to-back draws, with second-placed Inter hoping to close the gap to the leaders when they face Fiorentina on Monday.
